text.tspan: - Members and bases are recursively trivially copyable
- Member and bases are std layout recursively
- All members are all either public or private
- Only one class in the inheritance tree can have members
- Members and bases are trivial recursively
- No user defined or deleted default constructor
- Intersection of std layout and trivial
The intersection of POD, Aggregate, Regular, Literal
- Aggregate with no user defined destructor
